title: Fragment, ca. 1700
medium:
Medium: linen
Technique: damask, cross stitch
dimensions: Warp x Weft: 43.2 x 36 cm (17 x 14 3/16 in.)
description: Narrow panel of blue and white linen. Design in horizontal rows, two motifs repeating alternatively; 1. walled city with inscription "Gerusalem" and 2. the Resurrection with the inscription, "ich bin die auferstehung und das Leben. Johan am 11."  "R" embroidered in red linen cross-stitch in the lower right corner.  Triangular pocket of same material on back at lower edge.

tombstone.epitaph:
Fragment, ca. 1700. Medium: linen
Technique: damask, cross stitch. 1926-30-2.
